conversation.message_text: Luminox Watches: Welcome to Luminox Watches! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Luminox Watches: Hi there, this is Taylor. How can I help you? Stop to stop

Looking for dealers in New Orleans , Metairie ,Kenner la.  

I ordered a turtle but the hour and minute hand was too thin to see well. Can you make a recommendation

Luminox Watches: I'm sorry to hear that. You can send in a Repair Request through this link: https://luminox.attn.tv/aVsjqDAC-Kn2 For further assistance, you may contact our service center directly:

Saltzman Watches 
(401) 946-0930
customerservice@saltzmans-watches.com

Our team is happy to help!
I have a 30 day return guarantee.  I am looking for a different model . One with bolder hour and minute hands . A rubber band
Can you make a suggestion

Luminox Watches: Thank you for sharing that! Since you're within the 30-day return guarantee, you can absolutely exchange your current watch for a different model. Based on what you're looking for - bolder hour and minute hands with a rubber strap - I'd recommend checking out the Navy SEAL 3500 Series https://luminox.attn.tv/aMsBbfej6-TJ or the Pacific Diver 3120 Series https://luminox.attn.tv/auZchNBaVPSh. Both feature bold, highly legible hands and durable rubber bands, designed for comfort and performance.

Gardner White: PRESIDENTS DAY BEDROOM SALE: Save an EXTRA 30% OFF all these Bedrooms right now: gw.attn.tv/aRNYsbhCw5R6 .
Approximately how long will the palmer bunk beds with storage and stairs be back ordered? Can you give me an estimate of how long before they would be delivered?

Gardner White: Thank you for your interest in the Palmer Brown Twin Stair Bunk Bed: https://gw.attn.tv/aD6QC6MbxUpS
I'm afraid I can't confirm how long the delay would be. We have a wide delivery area across Michigan. We deliver to our regular delivery area 7 days a week, and other select areas on specific days of the week. If you live outside of our delivery area then we usually ship via UPS or FedEx and once shipped, it will take 7-10 business days to receive your order. Oversized items may take longer, 14-21 business days.
I have a question about white glove delivery
Gardner White: White Glove Delivery places your order in the room of your choice, fully assembled, with packaging removed. It starts at $149.99 and is free with mattresses starting at $699.

We will be purchasing a living room set, a bedroom set and a bunk bed set. The bunk bed is on back order. Would the price for white glove delivery be for all items if the bunk beds come later? We will need everything else delivered right away and don't want to wait for the bunk beds

Gardner White: Great question! If you order them at the same time, the price of the delivery should be applicable to all. However, just to be sure, I'll double-check this with my team for you. I'll update you as soon as I hear back. Please hang tight!
Thank you
Gardner White: My pleasure! Have a good day!

FaithGateway: We're so glad you're back! Save on your next order with code F-xoo5lF. Shop now: fg.attn.tv/afbxXS-g2H4i

Text back with any questions! - Rebecca
Discount code isn't working

FaithGateway: I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble applying the discount code F-xoo5lF. Please note that our codes do have some exclusions and may not work with certain deals or existing sales.

Could you let me know which items are currently in your cart? If it's easier, you can also share a screenshot, and I'll be glad to take a closer look and assist further.
The Way of the Wildflower
It's okay. Ordering.

FaithGateway: Thanks for the info. Sorry, it looks like the item you want is not eligible. The one you're interested in already benefits from a pre-applied discount, and our system generally doesn't allow multiple promotions to be used at checkout. Rest assured, you're already getting the best available deal. If you prefer, you can reserve the promo code for a future order. Thank you for your understanding!
No problem
